name: Affenpinscher
description: The Affenpinscher is a small, toy breed known for its monkey-like expression and curious, feisty personality.

name: Basenji
description: The Basenji is a small, graceful hunting dog known for its quiet nature. It is often referred to as the 'barkless dog.'

name: Bedlington Terrier
description: The Bedlington Terrier is known for its lamb-like appearance and gentle yet courageous personality. It excels as a companion dog.

name: Bluetick
description: The Bluetick is a breed of coonhound known for its excellent scent-tracking abilities and loyal personality.

name: Borzoi
description: The Borzoi is a graceful and elegant breed known for its speed and gentle disposition. They are independent yet affectionate.

name: Boston Bull
description: The Boston Bull is a compact, sturdy dog known for its friendly and lively personality. It's an excellent companion and family pet.

name: Boxer
description: The Boxer is a muscular and playful breed known for its affectionate and protective nature, making it a great family dog.

name: Cairn
description: The Cairn Terrier is a small, scrappy breed known for its bold personality and strong hunting instincts.

name: Coonhound
description: The Black-and-tan Coonhound is a large, powerful scent hound known for its tracking abilities and even temperament.

name: Deerhound
description: The Scottish Deerhound is a tall and elegant breed known for its endurance and gentle nature, originally bred to hunt deer.

name: Dingo
description: The Dingo is a wild dog found primarily in Australia. It's known for its adaptability and independent nature.

name: Dobermann
description: The Doberman is a sleek and powerful breed known for its loyalty and intelligence, often used in police and military work.

name: Fox Terrier
description: The Wire-haired Fox Terrier is a lively and fearless breed known for its strong hunting instincts and energetic personality.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Golden Retrievers are friendly, tolerant, and devoted. They are excellent family pets and great companions.

name: Hunting Dog
description: The African Hunting Dog, also known as the African Painted Dog, is a highly social and pack-oriented animal known for its hunting prowess.

name: Labrador Retriever
description: The Labrador Retriever is one of the most popular dog breeds. They are friendly, outgoing, and high-spirited companions.

name: Lakeland Terrier
description: The Lakeland Terrier is a sturdy and energetic breed known for its bold nature and excellent watchdog abilities.

name: Maltese Dog
description: The Maltese is a toy breed known for its long, silky white coat and playful, affectionate personality.

name: Norfolk Terrier
description: The Norfolk Terrier is a small but hardy breed known for its fearless nature and friendly disposition.

name: Otterhound
description: The Otterhound is a large, rough-coated breed known for its strong scenting abilities and love for water.

name: Pekinese
description: The Pekinese is a small, regal breed known for its distinctive lion-like appearance and dignified demeanor.

name: Redbone
description: The Redbone Coonhound is a friendly, determined breed known for its excellent tracking abilities and even temperament.

name: Schnauzer
description: The Standard Schnauzer is a medium-sized, robust breed known for its protective nature and distinctive bearded appearance.

name: Sheepdog
description: The Shetland Sheepdog, or Sheltie, is an intelligent, agile, and affectionate breed, making it a great companion and herder.

name: Walker Hound
description: The Walker Hound is a powerful and athletic breed known for its ability to track game over long distances with great stamina.

name: Water Spaniel
description: The Irish Water Spaniel is a curly-coated, lively breed known for its love of water and strong hunting skills.

name: Weimaraner
description: The Weimaraner is a large, sleek, and energetic breed known for its hunting abilities and close companionship with humans.
